title: Chipotle Quesadilla Accounts for 10% of Sales
itunes:title: Chipotle Quesadilla Accounts for 10% of Sales
description:
Chipotle CEO Brian Niccol discusses first quarter earnings, the popularity of their hand-crafted quesadillas and seeing record digital sales. 

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
